column2: ENGLISH
Clone Yourself
Commission a single-donor clone of yourself. The clone will take approximately nine months to gestate and will share almost all of your DNA.
column3: Demander la création d'un clône de vous-même. Le clône prendra environ neuf mois pour arriver à maturation et il partagera avec vous la quasi-totalité de votre ADN.

column2: Clone [This.GetFullName]
Commission a single-donor clone of [This.GetFullName] for §Y100§W¤. The clone will take approximately nine months to gestate and will share almost all of [This.GetHerHis] DNA.
column3: Demander la création d'un clône de [This.GetFullName]. Le clône prendra environ neuf mois pour arriver à maturation et il partagera avec vous la quasi-totalité de [This.GetPossPronoun] ADN.

column2: Multi-Donor Clone
column3: Ce personnage est un clône, un être humain créé artificiellement à partir du modèle génétique de quelqu'un d'autre.

column2: Commission a multi-donor clone of you and your spouse. The clone will take approximately nine months to gestate. Without polygamy this is essentially superadvanced in-vitro fertilization.
column3: Demander la création d'un clône de vous-même. Le clône prendra environ neuf mois pour arriver à maturation et il partagera avec vous la quasi-totalité de votre ADN.

column2: You arrange a meeting with a prominent Alien Geneticist, who agrees to have your genomes copied and used to grow a clone, for a rather hefty fee. The child will require approximately nine months of gestation, and will share all or almost all of your DNA.
column3: Vous arrangez un rendez-vous avec un éminent généticien du système [Root.Capital.GetName], qui accèpte de copier votre génôme et de l'utiliser pour créer un clône, à un tarif plutôt élevé. Le clône nécessitera environ neuf mois pour arriver à maturation, et partagera avec vous la majorité de votre ADN.

column2: You arrange a meeting with a prominent Alien Geneticist, who agrees to have the genomes of you and your spouse copied and used to grow a Vat Born child, for a rather hefty fee. The child will require approximately nine months of gestation.  While similar to a standard pregnancy, the chance for retaining genetic traits from each parent is much higher, and traits can be received from more than two parents if the character practices polygamy.
column3: Vous arrangez un rendez-vous avec un éminent généticien du système [Root.Capital.GetName], qui accèpte de copier votre génôme et de l'utiliser pour créer un clône, à un tarif plutôt élevé. Le clône nécessitera environ neuf mois pour arriver à maturation, et partagera avec vous la majorité de votre ADN.

column2: Commission a male clone.
Commission a female clone.
Nevermind.
A male clone will be grown and ready for decanting in approximately nine months.\n
column3: Un clône masculin va être cultiver et sera prêt au service dans environ neuf mois.\n

column2: A female clone will be grown and ready for decanting in approximately nine months.\n
column3: Un clône féminin va être cultiver et sera prêt au service dans environ neuf mois.\n

column2: §RWARNING!§! A female clone can be created using only a male donor by duplicating the donor's X chromosome. However, this may have severe side-effects, similar to the effects of inbreeding.
column3: Â§RATTENTION!Â§ Un clône féminin ne peu être créé à partir d'un donneur mâle qu'en dupplicant le chromosome X du donneur. Néanmoins, ceci peu avoir de graves effet secondaires, similaires aux effets de la consanguinité.

column2: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe celestial have graciously fulfilled your wish. A wondrous clone has been decanted for you by an alien geneticist. Soon, you find yourself holding your newly-grown son in your arms.
column3: Une note du laboratoire vient d'arriver, ils vous informent que votre clône a terminé la première phase de son développement et doit maintenant être affiné. Trés rapidement, vous vous retrouvez devant le laboratoire, votre fils cloné dans vos bras.

column2: What a wonderful baby boy.

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe celestial have graciously fulfilled your wish. A wondrous clone has been decanted for you by an alien geneticist. Soon, you find yourself holding your newly-grown daughter in your arms.
column3: Une note du laboratoire vient d'arriver, ils vous informent que votre clône a terminé la première phase de son développement et doit maintenant être affiné. Trés rapidement, vous vous retrouvez devant le laboratoire, votre fille clonée dans vos bras.

column2: What a wonderful baby girl.

This event should only fire for newly decanted clones, so I'm not sure how you're seeing this. In any case, I'm sorry to inform you that you suffer from cloning defects, although the lab might be able to fix them.
Goo-gah?
is informed that your defects have been dealt with.
is informed that your defects have not been dealt with.

The clone lab informs you that there were some slight errors during your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName]'s cloning process, but that they were able to smooth them out. The [From.GetLadLass] should be as healthy as can be.
The clone lab informs you that, unfortunately, there were some slight errors during your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName]'s cloning process, and they were unable to correct for all of them.
Disinherit

It is the duty of all leaders to ensure that future generations remain strong. In accordance with the [This.GetReligionName], it is possible for you to declare [This.GetFirstName] to be genetically defective, and remove [This.GetHerHim] from the line of succession.
You have declared one of your children to be genetically defective, and formally removed them from the line of succession.
Your [GetFromRelation] has declared you to be genetically defective, and formally removed you from the line of succession!
Disinherited Me
We can commission a single-donor clone of our courtier for §Y100§W¤. The clone will take approximately nine months to gestate and will share almost all of their DNA.
Commission a clone.
On second thought...
